mapper.select: SELECT B.CAR_PARK_NM, B.ADDRESS, B.SYSTEM, B.RNK FROM(SELECT A.CAR_PARK_NM, A.ADDRESS, A.SYSTEM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SYSTEM DESC) AS RNK FROM(SELECT C.CAR_PARK_NM, C.ADDRESS, (R.CCTV_STAR_SCORE + R.ENV_STAR_SCORE) / 2 AS SYSTEM FROM CAR_PARK C INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON C.CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM = R.CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM AND DEL = 1) A ) B WHERE B.RNK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT B.CAR_PARK_NM, B.ADDRESS, B.SYSTEM, B.RNK FROM (SELECT A.CAR_PARK_NM, A.ADDRESS, A.SYSTEM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SYSTEM DESC) AS RNK FROM (SELECT C.CAR_PARK_NM, C.ADDRESS, (R.FEE_STAR_SCORE + R.DIS_STAR_SCORE) / 2 AS SYSTEM FROM CAR_PARK C INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON C.CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM = R.CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM AND DEL = 1)A ) B WHERE B.RNK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CAR_PARK C INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON C.CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM = R.CAR_PARK_MAG_NUM WHERE DEL = 1
